txt.en: There are mountain-bears dwelling in the Bruinen Gorges, in the Trollshaws.\n\nWhile you are in the Bruinen Gorges, you should hunt bears for pelts.
There are mountain-bears dwelling in the Bruinen Gorges, in the Trollshaws.\n\nWhile you are in the Bruinen Gorges, you should hunt bears for pelts.
Bring the pelts you collected to one of the dwarves encamped at Thorenhad
Collect pelts from the bears of the Bruinen Gorges ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
There are dwarves encamped with the Elves at Thorenhad in the Bruinen Gorges.\n\nYou should bring the pelts you collected to one of the dwarves encamped at Thorenhad.
Collected pelts from the bears of the Bruinen Gorges ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'It was good of you to bring these pelts to us. These Elves may not feel the cold, but our old bones most certainly do!'
There are mountain-bears dwelling in the Bruinen Gorges, in the Trollshaws.\n\nWhile you are in the Bruinen Gorges, you should hunt bears for pelts.
Collect pelts from the bears of the Bruinen Gorges
Mountain-bears dwelling in the Bruinen Gorges would provide plenty of pelts which the dwarves could use to make blankets.
While you are in the Bruinen Gorges, you should hunt bears for pelts
Collect pelts from the bears of the Bruinen Gorges
